wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Shaw (29 April 1929 – 8 May 1985) was a footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Tranmere Rovers.

response: * Hugh Shaw (VC)  (1839–1904), recipient of the Victoria Cross
* Hugh Shaw (football manager) (1895/6–1976), Scottish football player and manager (Hibernian)
* Hugh Shaw (footballer, born 1929), Scottish football player (Tranmere Rovers)
